text: Accessibility-enhanced multimedia informational education patients had significantly lower anxiety levels and felt the most satisfied with the information and materials received compared with patients in groups 1 and 3 .
A total of 242 patients completed the study .
There was no significant difference between the two major guidelines though the American Thoracic Society guideline was easier to follow .
Peoples ' beliefs about diabetes are formed quickly after diagnosis , and thereafter seem to be relatively stable over extended follow-up .

Accessibility-e̷n̷h̷a̷n̷c̷e̷d̷ multimedia informational education patients had significantly 𝔩𝔬𝔴𝔢𝔯 a͎n͎x͎i͎e͎t͎y͎ levels ᴀɴᴅ f̴e̴l̴t̴ the most satisfied 𝔀𝓲𝓽𝓱 the information and 𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹𝘀 received compared with p̴a̴t̴i̴e̴n̴t̴s̴ in g̶r̶o̶u̶p̶s̶ 1 and 3.

Accessibility-enhanced multimedia informational education patients had significantly l̲o̲w̲e̲r̲ 𝔞𝔫𝔵𝔦𝔢𝔱𝔶 levels and felt the most satisfied w͎i͎t͎h͎ the 𝙞𝙣𝙛𝙤𝙧𝙢𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙤𝙣 and materials received compared with 𝓹𝓪𝓽𝓲𝓮𝓷𝓽𝓼 𝕚𝕟 𝔤𝔯𝔬𝔲𝔭𝔰 1 𝕒𝕟𝕕 3͎.

Accessibility -̾ e̶n̶h̶a̶n̶c̶e̶d̶ multimedia i̳n̳f̳o̳r̳m̳a̳t̳i̳o̳n̳a̳l̳ education patients had 𝚜𝚒𝚐𝚗𝚒𝚏𝚒𝚌𝚊𝚗𝚝𝚕𝚢 lower anxiety levels 𝔞𝔫𝔡 felt t͓̽h͓̽e͓̽ most satisfied with the i̶n̶f̶o̶r̶m̶a̶t̶i̶o̶n̶ and materials received compared with 𝚙𝚊𝚝𝚒𝚎𝚗𝚝𝚜 in 𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗽𝘀 1 and 3.

Accessibility-enhanced ᴍᴜʟᴛɪᴍᴇᴅɪᴀ i̾n̾f̾o̾r̾m̾a̾t̾i̾o̾n̾a̾l̾ education patients had significantly lower anxiety levels and felt t̴h̴e̴ most satisfied with the information a̷n̷d̷ 𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐚𝐥𝐬 received c̶o̶m̶p̶a̶r̶e̶d̶ with p͓̽a͓̽t͓̽i͓̽e͓̽n͓̽t͓̽s͓̽ in groups 1 and 3.

Accessibility-enhanced m̷u̷l̷t̷i̷m̷e̷d̷i̷a̷ informational e̳d̳u̳c̳a̳t̳i̳o̳n̳ patients 𝗵𝗮𝗱 significantly lower a͎n͎x͎i͎e͎t͎y͎ levels and felt 𝐭𝐡𝐞 most 𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐟𝐢𝐞𝐝 with the information and 𝕞𝕒𝕥𝕖𝕣𝕚𝕒𝕝𝕤 received compared with p͎a͎t͎i͎e͎n͎t͎s͎ in groups 1 and 3.

Accessibility-enhanced multimedia informational 𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 had 𝚜𝚒𝚐𝚗𝚒𝚏𝚒𝚌𝚊𝚗𝚝𝚕𝚢 𝓁𝑜𝓌𝑒𝓇 anxiety levels a̶n̶d̶ felt the most satisfied w͓̽i͓̽t͓̽h͓̽ 𝒕𝒉𝒆 information and materials received c̴o̴m̴p̴a̴r̴e̴d̴ with patients in groups 1 and 3.
A t̾o̾t̾a̾l̾ of 242 𝙥𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙨 completed the study.
A t͓̽o͓̽t͓̽a͓̽l͓̽ of 242 patients completed the study.
𝘼 t͓̽o͓̽t͓̽a͓̽l͓̽ of 242 patients completed the study.
A total of 242 p̳a̳t̳i̳e̳n̳t̳s̳ 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒑𝒍𝒆𝒕𝒆𝒅 the study.
A 𝐭𝐨𝐭𝐚𝐥 𝚘𝚏 242 patients completed the study.
A total 𝗼𝗳 242 patients completed 𝚝𝚑𝚎 study.
There 𝓌𝒶𝓈 no significant difference between the two major g͎u͎i͎d͎e͎l͎i͎n͎e͎s͎ though 𝙩𝙝𝙚 American Thoracic Society guideline 𝘄𝗮𝘀 𝓮𝓪𝓼𝓲𝓮𝓻 to follow.̷
There was n̲o̲ significant difference b̲e̲t̲w̲e̲e̲n̲ the two major 𝕘𝕦𝕚𝕕𝕖𝕝𝕚𝕟𝕖𝕤 t̷h̷o̷u̷g̷h̷ the American Thoracic Society guideline 𝕨𝕒𝕤 easier to follow.̲
There was no significant difference between t̶h̶e̶ 𝕥𝕨𝕠 major guidelines t̶h̶o̶u̶g̶h̶ t̲h̲e̲ 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧 Thoracic Society guideline was easier to follow.
There w̴a̴s̴ no 𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐢𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐭 difference between the two major guidelines t̷h̷o̷u̷g̷h̷ 𝘁𝗵𝗲 American Thoracic Society guideline was easier t̴o̴ 𝘧𝘰𝘭𝘭𝘰𝘸.
T͎h͎e͎r͎e͎ was no significant difference between the two 𝘮𝘢𝘫𝘰𝘳 𝗴𝘂𝗶𝗱𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗻𝗲𝘀 though the American Thoracic Society g̾u̾i̾d̾e̾l̾i̾n̾e̾ was ᴇᴀꜱɪᴇʀ 𝕥𝕠 follow.
T̴h̴e̴r̴e̴ was no significant difference between the two major guidelines though the 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐧 T̷h̷o̷r̷a̷c̷i̷c̷ S̶o̶c̶i̶e̶t̶y̶ guideline was easier t̴o̴ follow.
P͎e͎o͎p͎l͎e͎s͎' b̷e̷l̷i̷e̷f̷s̷ about ᴅɪᴀʙᴇᴛᴇꜱ 𝒶𝓇𝑒 f̶o̶r̶m̶e̶d̶ quickly after diagnosis, and thereafter seem to be 𝙧𝙚𝙡𝙖𝙩𝙞𝙫𝙚𝙡𝙮 stable over extended follow-up.
Peoples' beliefs about 𝕕𝕚𝕒𝕓𝕖𝕥𝕖𝕤 are formed quickly after 𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐠𝐧𝐨𝐬𝐢𝐬, and thereafter seem to be ʀᴇʟᴀᴛɪᴠᴇʟʏ ꜱᴛᴀʙʟᴇ over extended f̶o̶l̶l̶o̶w̶-up.
Peoples' 𝒃𝒆𝒍𝒊𝒆𝒇𝒔 a̷b̷o̷u̷t̷ d͓̽i͓̽a͓̽b͓̽e͓̽t͓̽e͓̽s͓̽ are formed quickly after diagnosis, and 𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒇𝒕𝒆𝒓 seem to be relatively stable over extended follow -̷ u̴p̴.͎
Peoples' beliefs about d͓̽i͓̽a͓̽b͓̽e͓̽t͓̽e͓̽s͓̽ are 𝔣𝔬𝔯𝔪𝔢𝔡 quickly a̾f̾t̾e̾r̾ diagnosis, and thereafter seem 𝕥𝕠 be relatively stable 𝑜𝓋𝑒𝓇 𝔢𝔵𝔱𝔢𝔫𝔡𝔢𝔡 follow-up.
Peoples' beliefs about diabetes a̳r̳e̳ formed quickly ᴀꜰᴛᴇʀ diagnosis, ᴀɴᴅ thereafter 𝘀𝗲𝗲𝗺 𝕥𝕠 be r̶e̶l̶a̶t̶i̶v̶e̶l̶y̶ stable over extended follow-up.
Peoples' beliefs a̴b̴o̴u̴t̴ diabetes a̳r̳e̳ formed quickly after diagnosis, and 𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒇𝒕𝒆𝒓 seem 𝒕𝒐 be relatively stable 𝑜𝓋𝑒𝓇 extended f̲o̲l̲l̲o̲w̲-ᴜᴘ.
